issue.title: Model Database section missing under Insert in Model Editor

content.raw:
I have the same issue in Kubuntu 16.04. Cdfghglz stated a fresh install solves the problem but I don't want to do a fresh install(if possible). Any advise to solve the problem ?
Edit: The problem resolved after ROS installation.
I installed ROS with 

```
#!sh

sudo apt-get install ros-kinetic-desktop-full
```
then tried again , and I can use model database in Model editor now.

then tried again , and I can use model database in Model editor now.
